content.query:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Arrests]
( 
	[ID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,
	[CaseNumber] [varchar](10)  NULL,
	[CB_No] [int]  NULL,
	[ArrestDate] [date]  NULL,
	[Year] [smallint]  NULL,
	[RaceID] [int]  NULL,
	[RowInsertDate] [date]  NULL,
	[RowUpdateDate] [date]  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH ( [Year] ),
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)


CREATE TABLE [dbo].[ChargeDetails]
( 
	[ID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,
	[ChargeStatute] [varchar](150)  NULL,
	[ChargeDescription] [varchar](150)  NULL,
	[ChargeType] [char](5)  NULL,
	[ChargeClass] [char](5)  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)


CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Charges]
( 
	[CB_No] [int]  NULL,
	[ChargeDetailID] [int]  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH ( [ChargeDetailID] ),
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);


CREATE TABLE [dbo].[CrimeReport]
( 
	[ID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,
	[IUCR] [varchar](10)  NULL,
	[FBIID] [int]  NULL,
	[Description] [varchar](50)  NULL
)
with
(
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)


CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Crimes]
( 
	[ID] [int]  NULL,
	[CaseNumber] [varchar](15)  NULL,
	[Date] [date]  NULL,
	[Year] [int]  NULL,
	[CrimeReportID] [int]  NULL,
	[LocationDescription] [varchar](300)  NULL,
	[Arrest] [bit]  NULL,
	[DistrictID] [int]  NULL,
	[UpdatedOn] [datetime]  NULL,
	[RowInsertDate] [date]  NULL,
	[RowUpdateDate] [date]  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH ( [Year] ),
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)


CREATE TABLE [dbo].[District]
( 
	[ID] [int]  NULL,
	[DistrictName] [varchar](20)  NULL,
	[Longitude] [numeric](10,6)  NULL,
	[Latitude] [numeric](10,6)  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)


CREATE TABLE [dbo].[FBICode]
( 
	[ID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,
	[PrimaryType] [varchar](30)  NULL,
	[FBICode] [varchar](10)  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)


CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Race]
( 
	[ID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,
	[Race] [varchar](50)  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
